title: Negative Feedback: Installation
body:
It has been 5 hours.
And it will take at least another hour.

95% of the way through the client patch, it says to leave 8 GB of space open.

There was 7.8 GB of space open. Now after deleting two files, I am restarting the entire process, from 0%.

Not cool.
Please make this less of an agony.

replies.body: If it's taking this long then your connection might be unstable, and often backtracking to try and pick up missed files.  While it's really important to have enough space, a strong connection to the patching server is too!  I suggest going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune that up.  I hope that helps!

While it's really important to have enough space, a strong connection to the patching server is too!  I suggest going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune that up.  I hope that helps!

It got done, so it's all good.

 At least now I can browse around my masteries and runes while a patch is loading, or view my match history, so I am definitely a fan of that. That's something great there.
